title: (nursing) 有無人教看ventilator，bipap , chest drain case

replies.msg: 有無人教看ventilator，bipap , chest drain case

quote.msg: 有無人教看ventilator，bipap , chest drain case
有無人教看ventilator，bipap , chest drain case

replies.msg:
Ventilator 其實唔太複雜
最緊要睇下佢行緊咩Mode先
Volume/pressure drive ?
Control/support
最Basic嘅4個mode就係上面呢4個
之後有啲咩APPV/NIV/SIMV/ASV 其實都係上面果4個變出黎

Mechanical ventilation 嘅main parameters 有幾個

Vt, tial volume 有分vti /vte
PEEP, positive end expiratory pressure
Pin, inspiratory pressure/driving pressure
Pe, expiratory pressure
MV, minute volume
Ftotal, total frequency
I:E ratio, insp/exp time ratio有時係set Ti/Te黎set
FiO2, o2 given by ventilator

大約就係咁多
部部機嘅名/setting 都有啲唔同
未必同可以set曬上面嘅野
睇醫生果時想點再Set啦

如果要睇埋lung mechanics仲有大吧parameters 要識 想知再講
